question: According to its nutritional info, a bag of cookies has 250 calories per serving. If a 100 grams bag has 4 servings, how many gramss can you eat if your daily calorie target is 2025 and you have already consumed 775 calories?
answer:
If the total calorie target is 2025 and I have consumed 775 calories then I have 2025-775 = <<2025-775=1250>>1250 calories left to eat
If each serving of cookies has 250 calories and I only have 1250 calories left to eat, then I can only eat 1250/250 of a serving = 5 of a serving
We also know that a 100 grams bag of cookies has 4 servings, hence each serving has 100 grams/4 = <<100/4=25>>25 gramss
If I can only eat 5 of a serving, then I can eat only 25 grams * 5 = 125 gramss
#### 125
